quiz.question: The UK government has set a target for ‘zero carbon’ by 2050. Scientists say meeting this target will...
answers: minimise damage done by climate breakdown
be nowhere near enough to prevent climate breakdown
quiz.reference: IPCC ‘Global Warming of 1.5 C special report’ Oct 2018. Summary for Policymakers paragraph D.1 and D.1.1
quiz.extra: We also need to achieve a 40% to 50% cut in emissions by 2030.
